installCommand: yum install -y gcc make perl wget && OPENSSL_VERSION='openssl-1.1.1m' && wget https://www.openssl.org/source/${OPENSSL_VERSION}.tar.gz && tar -xzf ${OPENSSL_VERSION}.tar.gz && cd ${OPENSSL_VERSION} && ./config --prefix=$HOME/openssl --openssldir=$HOME/openssl shared zlib && make && make install && openssl version && python3 --version && python3 -m pip install pdm && python3 -m pdm install -v && ls -a && python3 -m pdm run mkdocs
